anya-e0905n4:198_0: Pucchā – devadattassa āvuso pakāsanīyakammaṁ kārāpetvā kathaṁ bhagavā pakāsetuṁ āṇāpesi.
anya-e0905n4:199_1: bhagavā bhante devadattassa pakāsanīyakammaṁ kātuṁ paññapetvā āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ āmantesi “tena hi tvaṁ sāriputta devadattaṁ rājagahe pakāsehī”ti,
anya-e0905n4:199_2: evaṁ kho bhante devadattassa pakāsanīyakammaṁ katvā devadattaṁ rājagahe pakāsetuṁ bhagavā āṇāpesi.
anya-e0905n4:201_1: kathaṁ āvuso devadattena duṭṭhacittena vadhakacittena tathā gatassa ruhiraṁ uppādetvā paṭhamaṁ ānantariyaṁ kammaṁ upacitaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:202_1: bhagavā bhante gijjhakūṭassa pabbatassa chāyāyaṁ caṅkami,
anya-e0905n4:202_2: atha bhante devadatto gijjhakūṭaṁ pabbataṁ āruhitvā mahatiṁ silaṁ pavijjhi “imāya samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ jīvitā voropessāmī”ti,
anya-e0905n4:202_3: atha kho bhante dve pabbatakūṭāni samāgantvā taṁ silaṁ sampaṭicchiṁsu,
anya-e0905n4:202_4: tato papatikā uppatitvā bhagavato pāde ruhiraṁ uppādesi.
anya-e0905n4:202_5: Evaṁ kho bhante devadattena duṭṭhena vadhakacittena tathāgatassa ruhiraṁ uppādetvā paṭhamaṁ ānantariyakammaṁ upacitaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:203_1: kulesu āvuso tikabhojanaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:204_2: devadatto bhante parihīnalābhasakkāro sapariso kulesu viññāpetvā viññāpetvā bhuñji,
anya-e0905n4:205_3: garuko kho devadatta saṅghabhedotiādiko āvuso ovādo bhagavatā kattha dinno,
anya-e0905n4:207_0: Alaṁ devadatta, mā te rucci saṅghabhedo, garuko kho devadatta saṅghabhedo –
anya-e0905n4:208_5: āvuso idaṁ udānaṁ bhagavatā kattha udānitaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:209_2: āyasmā bhante ānando pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi,
anya-e0905n4:209_3: atha kho bhante devadatto yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami,
anya-e0905n4:209_4: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca “ajjatagge dānāhaṁ āvuso ānanda aññatreva bhagavatā aññatreva
anya-e0905n4:210_0: Sukaraṁ sādhunā sādhuṁ, sādhuṁ pāpena dukkaraṁ;
anya-e0905n4:212_1: bhedānuvattakānaṁ āvuso bhikkhūnaṁ thullaccayaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:213_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:213_2: āyasmā bhante sāriputto bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “sādhu bhante bhedānuvattakā bhikkhū puna upasampajjeyyu”nti,
anya-e0905n4:215_1: kittāvatā nu kho āvuso saṅgharāji hoti no ca saṅghabhedo,
anya-e0905n4:215_2: kittāvatā ca pana saṅgharāji ceva hoti saṅghabhedo ca.
anya-e0905n4:216_3: salākaṁ gāheti “ayaṁ dhammo ayaṁ vinayo idaṁ satthusāsanaṁ imaṁ gaṇhatha imaṁ rocethāti”,
anya-e0905n4:216_4: eteneva bhante nayena catunnaṁ vā pañcannaṁ vā channaṁ vā sattannaṁ vā aṭṭhannaṁ vā saṅgharāji hoti,
anya-e0905n4:216_9: salākaṁ gāheti “ayaṁ dhammo ayaṁ vinayo idaṁ satthusāsanaṁ imaṁ gaṇhatha imaṁ rocethā”ti,
anya-e0905n4:216_10: evaṁ kho bhante saṅgharāji ceva hoti saṅghabhedo ca.
anya-e0905n4:216_13: evañca pana bhante saṅgharāji ceva hoti saṅghabhedo ca.
anya-e0905n4:217_0: Pucchā – kittāvatā nu kho āvuso saṅgho bhinno hoti.
anya-e0905n4:218_1: idha bhante bhikkhū adhammādiṁ dhammādīnīti dīpenti,
anya-e0905n4:218_7: evaṁ kho bhante saṅgho bhinno hoti.
anya-e0905n4:219_0: Pucchā – kittāvatā nu kho āvuso saṅgho samaggo hoti.
anya-e0905n4:220_1: idha bhante bhikkhū adhammaṁ adhammoti dīpenti,
anya-e0905n4:220_6: te imehi aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi na apakassanti,
anya-e0905n4:220_11: ettāvatā kho bhante saṅgho samaggo hoti.
anya-e0905n4:221_0: Pucchā – samaggaṁ āvuso saṅghaṁ bhinditvā kiṁ so pasavati.
anya-e0905n4:222_1: samaggaṁ kho bhante saṅghaṁ bhinditvā kappaṭṭhitikaṁ kibbisaṁ pasavati,
anya-e0905n4:223_0: Pucchā – bhinnaṁ kho āvuso saṅghaṁ samaggaṁ katvā kiṁ so pasavati.
anya-e0905n4:224_1: bhinnaṁ kho bhante saṅghaṁ samaggaṁ katvā brahmaṁ puññaṁ pasavati,
anya-e0905n4:225_0: Pucchā – saṅghabhedaṁ pucchissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n4:228_1: āgantukānaṁ āvuso bhikkhūnaṁ vattaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:229_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule āgantuke bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:229_2: āgantukā bhante bhikkhū saupāhanāpi ārāmaṁ pavisiṁsu,
anya-e0905n4:229_9: tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “tena hi bhikkhave āgantukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ vattaṁ paññapessāmi,
anya-e0905n4:229_11: āgantukena bhikkhave bhikkhunā idāni ārāmaṁ pavisissāmīti upāhanā omuñcitvā nīcaṁ katvā papphoṭetvā gahetvā
anya-e0905n4:229_12: chattaṁ apanāmetvā sīsaṁ vivaritvā sīse cīvaraṁ khandhe katvā sādhukaṁ ataramānena ārāmo pavisitabbo”
anya-e0905n4:229_13: evamādinā bhante āgantukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ vattaṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:230_1: āvāsikānaṁ āvuso bhikkhūnaṁ vattaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:231_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule āvāsike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:231_2: sambahulā bhante āvāsikā bhikkhū āgantuke bhikkhū disvā neva āsanaṁ paññapesuṁ,
anya-e0905n4:232_0: “Āvāsikena bhikkhave bhikkhunā āgantukaṁ bhikkhuṁ vuḍḍhataraṁ disvā āsanaṁ paññapetabbaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:232_2: paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṁ paṭiggahetabbaṁ pānīyena pucchitabbo” evamādinā bhante āvāsikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ vattaṁ bhagavatā paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:233_1: gamikānaṁ āvuso bhikkhūnaṁ vattaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:234_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule gamike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:234_2: sambahulā bhante gamikā bhikkhū dārubhaṇḍaṁ mattikābhaṇḍaṁ appaṭisāmetvā dvāravātapānaṁ vivaritvā senāsanaṁ anāpucchā pakkamiṁsu,
anya-e0905n4:234_3: tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “gamikena bhikkhave bhikkhunā dārubhaṇḍaṁ paṭisāmetvā dvāravātapānaṁ thaketvā
anya-e0905n4:234_4: senāsanaṁ āpucchā pakkamitabbaṁ” evamādinā bhante ākārena bhagavatā gamikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ vattaṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:235_1: bhattagge āvuso anumodituṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:236_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:237_1: bhikkhūnaṁ āvuso bhattaggavattaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:238_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:238_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū dunnivatthā duppārutā anākappasampannā bhattaggaṁ gacchiṁsu,
anya-e0905n4:238_3: tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “sace ārāme kālo ārocito hoti,
anya-e0905n4:238_4: timaṇḍalaṁ paṭicchādentena parimaṇḍalaṁ nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṁ bandhitvā saguṇaṁ katvā saṅghāṭiyo pārupitvā
anya-e0905n4:238_5: gaṇṭhikaṁ paṭimuñcitvā dhovitvā pattaṁ gahetvā sādhukaṁ ataramānena gāmo pavisitabbo”ti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0905n4:239_1: bhikkhūnaṁ āvuso senāsanavattaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:240_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:240_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūsu ajjhokāse cīvaraṁ karontesu paṭivāte aṅgaṇe senāsanaṁ papphoṭesuṁ,
anya-e0905n4:240_5: sace ussahati sodhetabbo”ti evamādinā bhante bhikkhūnaṁ senāsanavattaṁ bhagavatā paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:241_0: Pucchā – samācāraṁ pucchissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n4:242_0: Vissajjanā – samācāraṁ vissajjissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n4:244_1: sāpattikena āvuso pātimokkhaṁ suṇantassa pātimokkhaṁ ṭhapetuṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:245_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ puggalaṁ dussīlaṁ pāpadhammaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:245_2: aññataro bhante puggalo dussīlo pāpadhammo tadahuposathe saṅghamajjhe nisinno ahosi,
anya-e0905n4:246_0: Pucchā – ṭhapanaṁ āvuso pucchissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n4:247_0: Vissajjanā – ṭhapanaṁ vissajjissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n4:249_1: aṭṭhahi āvuso garudhammehi upasampadā bhagavatā kattha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n4:250_2: mahāpajāpati bhante gotamī sūnehi pādehi rajokiṇṇena gattena dukkhī dummanā assumukhī rudamānā bahidvārakoṭṭhake aṭṭhāsi,
anya-e0905n4:250_3: atha kho bhante āyasmā ānando mahāpajāpatiṁ gotamiṁ taṁ kāraṇaṁ pucchitvā bhagavantaṁ catukkhattuṁ yāci
anya-e0905n4:250_4: mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye āgārasmā anāgāriyaṁ pabbajjaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:251_1: bhikkhūhi āvuso bhikkhuniyo upasampādetuṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:252_1: vesāliyaṁ bhante mahāpajāpatiṁ gotamiṁ ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:252_2: mahāpajāpati bhante gotamī bhagavantaṁ etadavoca “kathāhaṁ bhante imāsu sākiyānīsu paṭipajjāmī”ti,
anya-e0905n4:253_1: ekato upasampannāya āvuso bhikkhunisaṅghe visuddhāya bhikkhusaṅghe upasampādetuṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:254_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:254_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhunīnaṁ antarāyike dhamme pucchiṁsu,
anya-e0905n4:259_0: Pucchā – pañcasatikaṁ pucchissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n4:263_0: Pucchā – sattasatikaṁ pucchissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n4:266_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n4:268_0: Vissajjanā – sekkhā ca bhante puthujjanakalyāṇakā ca sikkhanti.
